article: Mr. Brown is 75 years old. He lives with his daughter's family. Every morning he goes to _ in the park. And at twelve thirty he _ home for lunch. But today a _ car stops at his house at twelve. Two policemen  help him get out. One of _ says to Mr. Brown's daughter, "The old man can't find his _ in the park. He calls us to take him to his home in our car." The daughter _ the policemen and the policemen leaves . Then she asks her _ , "You go to that park to walk every day and you _ lose your way. But today, you can't find the way. What's wrong with you?" "I can find my way. I just don't _ to walk home today," the old man says and smiles   like a child.
